title: [PolyU] 紅磚大學討論區（32） - 香港彈弓大學

replies.msg:
最近校園火車橋入口經常有可疑人士藉故撩fm
可能係暗O/推銷/不明宗教團體等等嘅招徠手法
返去攞student ID嘅fmbb記得保持警惕
記住我無嘢講！一句嘢都唔好答佢哋

今年仲有冇Ocamp？
今年因為疫情，Reg day同所有正規嘅O camp都係暫時取消咗，未知幾時搞返。Fm們要小心校園周圍可能會有人撩你報O camp，嗰啲屬於暗O，並唔係由Poly SU或屬會舉辦，出事唔會有任何保障，所以千祈唔好報。留意正規嘅大中細O喺收咗錢後，都會即時收到以學生會名義發出嘅正式收據，而暗O就唔會。

想住hall，有咩要留意？
學校政策係4年1宿，你從來未住過嘅通常都可以reg到，但因為hall宿位極之緊張，除非你住得極遠/有特殊需要 etc，否則住咗一年之後再re-reg成功係幾難
Hall有分兩個，分別喺紅磡灣(舊hall)同何文田站(新hall)
舊hall有分8個唔同hall，hall culture都有分別，想知請自己google或問人，非常唔建議喺公開平台包括lihkg問，因為答你嘅多數係打手
注意想住得摺啲請揀尾房區(blue zone)，唔係你會晚晚畀人yo
新hall因為冇hall莊，基本上冇hall life可言，支那人亦相當多，但如果你想摺埋嘅其實住得過

咩係CAR？CRCW, CSR, EREW又係咩嚟？
除咗你major嘅course之外，你喺grad之前需要清曬30 credit 嘅GUR
GUR入面嘅Freshmen seminar, 中英文course同埋Tomorrow’s leaders 會由你department代你reg
而CAR 同SL就需要你自己reg
CAR類似其他U嘅通識課程，有分A B C D四個範疇，你需要喺四個範疇各讀1科，4科入面又同時要fulfill CRCW, CSR, EREW三個要求
一般做法會係其中一科EREW，一科就CRCW+CSR ，其餘兩科就揀冇CRCW, CSR, EREW
Fm sem1唔太建議讀有EREW/CRCW嘅CAR，因為都需要寫3000字嘅paper，year1 sem1 未識寫 paper走去讀好易爛龜

Reg 科有咩要留意？
請睇以下Reg 科常問答
1. Pre-reg左普通話CLC點轉廣東話
如果係CLC1104P/CLC1105P可以係adjustment period / add drop 轉
先到先得售完即止

2. 新學生reg咩科好
参考自己科既program docs, 一係自己couse intranet,一係library "PolyU Course Programmes Database"

3. CAR reg咩科好
自己睇 registration date 邊科d位去得最快 / 問下睇有冇人讀過

4. Free elective 點fufill
讀乜都得, 通常3個玩法
1. 用黎讀minor (year 2 10月申請)
2. 讀多d CAR
3. 讀多d 自己dept 既elective

5. CAR肥左點算
冇得retake, 請reg返同一個area 既CAR

6. SL跨sem 點計study load
每個sem 1.5cred

7. FYP 跨sem 點計study load
每個sem 3cred

8. Minor apply完點排時間表
所有野自己安排自己reg, 唔會有人幫你
讀唔掂可以drop

9. Reg科第一日confirm 左但發現有錯點算
等第2日re-opening , 到時想confirm幾多次都得

10. 如果fail左pre requisite點算
1. 可以同department 講, 如果gpa好會放比你reg
2. 讀GUR / free elctive 塞飽佢

11. 全部major科嘅vacancy係0點swap tutorial
搵到人同你調再email teaching staff

12. senior entry洗唔洗讀heathy lifestyle
唔洗 淨係讀2科CAR& SL就得
2科CAR 記得fufill哂 CRCW / EREW / CSR


學校入面點搵路？
以下係校園地圖
https://www.polyu.edu.hk/campus-map/
注意平時人行嗰層叫podium，其實係2樓。campus入面圓筒形嘅建築物叫core，入面係通往各層嘅樓梯同電梯，而房間一般會喺core同core之間嘅一字形座(wing)入面
舉例：由podium去HJ301，就要先搵H core 或者J core，然後上一層去3樓，入HJ wing，咁就會搵到HJ301
而VA, VS, M, MN, N, V, X, Y, Z 依幾座係唔同其他core相連嘅獨立座，但口語上都會以core稱呼
大部份wing都有冠sponsor嘅人名，例如Y core又叫李兆基樓，但唔會有poly人咁叫，請用A-Z core嘅叫法

我張學生八達通就到期，要點申請續期？
為咗減少人流聚集，今年AR取消咗以往即場cup印仔核實申請表嘅做法。今年嘅程序係咁嘅：
1. 喺黨鐵網站(http://www.mtr.com.hk/en/customer/tickets/student_travel_scheme.html) download 申請表填好
2. 填好後入去AR嘅online form (https://www.polyu.edu.hk/pfs/index.php/survey/index/sid/585637/newtest/Y/lang/en)登記你張申請表嘅編號
3. 完成以上兩個step之後，親身去M core 1樓 AR service centre入箱，或者用郵遞方式交畀學校，deadline係9月18日
4. AR會代你將核實咗嘅form交畀黨鐵公司，大約10月6日或之前會經學校email通知結果

注意如果你需要申請全新嘅八達通，AR喺verify完會成份form寄返畀你，唔會代你交

學校有咩canteen？附近有咩好嘢食？
學校嘅食店清單
https://www.polyu.edu.hk/fo/FO_Web/index.php?page=8&subpage=cat01
注意communal canteen(新can)、茶樓同starbucks係美心，而VA canteen(舊can)係大家樂，藍店？不了

但好過其他U嘅地方，就係學校入面係有黃店can
Z Can同埋A core嘅餐廳(aka 靚can)係黃店favilla開嘅，佢哋fb page一路都有表態，823嘅蘋果頭版亦有佢哋嘅廣告
而位於GH嘅玻璃屋亦有指係黃，但唔係太肯定

除咗campus之外，其實尖沙咀同紅磡都有好多黃食店，請睇以下
嘉寶漢堡
尖沙咀金巴利道78號金輝閣地下A號舖
東京食堂
尖沙咀柯士甸路15A柯士甸大廈地下D舖
水門雞飯
尖沙咀金馬倫道18號萬勤商業大廈地舖
唇茶
尖沙咀堪富利士道8號地鋪
孖寶越南湯河
尖沙咀柯士甸路17號豐樂大廈地下4C號舖
光榮冰室
尖沙咀厚福街5-6號地下6 號鋪

黃埔黃店評價
蒙麵:
蕃茄薯仔湯同叉燒好高質，但間鋪好細坐得極唔C服，次次去都排長龍
1仔冰室:
中上茶記質素，野食大大份又唔貴
時新漢堡包:
賣港式漢堡包為主，唔算好食但勝在夠平
新川:
又平又足料，不過辣到食唔曬
串噹噹:
串燒質素唔錯，但幾串串燒等兩個鐘肚餓冇耐性千祈唔好去
龍冰:
不了
其他等人補充

拉麵鋪食過別天神同豚道樂，兩間都有啲普通比多十幾蚊去尖沙咀食麵處一家好過
麵睦月同拉麵天王就未試過，紅磡應該得呢四間黃拉麵
漢堡包又係可以去尖東食嘉寶，正好多
btw原來黃埔新開左間齊柏林


學校有咩設施？
影印：可以去library、網吧(M core 3/F)或者VA core 1/F嘅學生會印場。另外department應該會有printing quota，不過唔多，亦要去dept嘅computer room用

買嘢：VA 2/F有7仔、銀行同書店，不過書店係三中商(中聯辦直屬嘅紅店)
VA 1/F 福記有基本嘅文具同零食

體育設施：(因武肺暫時停開)
室內設施就康文體育館有嘅嘢poly都有，分別喺VS S同X三個core
用gym room之前需要上fitness training course，但幾難搶，建議去上康文簡介會返嚟cup牌
泳池有兩個，一個喺VS嘅露天50米池，但係要有心理準備，雖然有磨砂紙，但係舊can食緊嘢嘅人係可以睇到你游水。另外X core有25米室內暖水池
除咗游水，以上嘅設施都需要上POSS訂場，而且唔容易book到(特別係gym)
另外九龍塘嘅joint sports centre有田徑場同網球場，由BU管理，不過都係喺POSS book
https://www.polyu.edu.hk/poss

睇病：
學校保健處(獸醫)有得睇中醫同西醫，位置喺A core G/F 噴水池旁邊
https://www.polyu.edu.hk/uhs/hk/
牙醫診所
https://www.polyu.edu.hk/uhs/hk/ourservices/student-dental-service/
另外有視光診所同rehab clinic(pt/ot)，不過因為屬於私家診所，價錢唔平，請自行判斷

見輔導員：
去返POSS book，或者上QT 3/F reception book

Subway can食法

1. 揀包
最普通白麵包就Italian White
另外可以考慮
Honey Oat (甜啲)
Parmesan Oregano (芝士香草味)

2. 揀餡 睇個人喜好
唔知食咩好就可以叫「sub of the day」 又平又好食

3. 跟住佢會拎個包去焗一焗 所以要等吓

4. 揀配料 即係大家最熟悉嘅this this this
驚其他配料食唔慣可以嗌淨生菜 lettuce only
每次趁啊姐執完菜先再講can I have more XX please 就會幫你塞到啲菜滿曬

5. 揀要邊種汁 又係好睇個人喜好
最大路選擇係Honey mustard ,BBQ同mayonnaise
Chipotle同ranch 呢兩隻都可以一戰
仲有隱藏嘅salt and vinegar 但似乎好淡味
加12蚊可以轉牛油果醬，但其實就係一pat牛油果蓉，冇乜特別

6. 磅水

Z can食法

首先揀主食：飯/拉麵/烏冬
飯可以揀普通飯或者咖哩(辣/唔辣)

之後會放雜菜 包埋嘅
通常係椰菜、翠玉瓜、矮瓜、甘筍之類
揀飲擇食嘅可以叫走菜/少菜

之後揀餸，大約有十幾種：
炸既: 吉列豬扒 南蠻脆炸雞 炸雞翼 吉列魚 炸蝦
唔炸既: 照燒豆腐粒 咖喱牛肉 壽喜燒牛肉 照燒雞扒 豬軟骨 燒鯖魚 蕃茄炒強
(可能有唔同 depends)
一份餐包一餸，兩餸+$10 ，三餸+$16
另外可以加溫泉強

野飲有清茶或者熱齋啡(可以自己加奶)
凍飲都係依兩隻 +$3

單餸飯麵應該$32-$36左右，加餸或者加配料另計
另外可以加嗌coffee menu上面嘅咖啡，照原價另減$10

A core 靚can 食法 (㩒入去睇)
過兩日開sem，祝大家過三爆四／出pool／搵到intern

新post lm 祝大家過三爆四
fm就快啲習慣U嘅生活

Dear Students

Welcome to the new academic year!

As the COVID-19 pandemic situation in Hong Kong continues to improve, the University has decided to facilitate selected subjects to be taught face-to-face (f2f) for classes of size 50 or below, from the 5th week of Semester 1, 2020/21 (i.e. 5 October 2020), with the arrangements as follows:

The timetables for your classes will remain unchanged throughout Semester 1 unless otherwise advised by your subject teachers.

During the first 4 weeks (Until 4 October 2020), all classes including lectures, seminars and tutorials, except for essential f2f learning and teaching activities as announced on 18 July 2020 (click here for the notice), will continue to be conducted real-time online as centrally timetabled, using Blackboard Collaborate Ultra, MS Teams or Zoom as appropriate.

From Week 5 to Week 13 (5 October to 5 December 2020), while classes with size greater than 50 will remain online, some classes with size 50 or below will be conducted f2f on campus and simultaneously online. The availability of f2f classes depends on the pedagogical needs of the academic disciplines concerned, such as class interaction, group activities, and the availability of classrooms. Students can refer to the updates of the central timetable and classroom arrangements via eStudent from 28 September 2020 and/or advice from the subject teachers on the start date and end date of f2f teaching. ​
Classes to be conducted f2f will be assigned a classroom of at least twice the class size and students are required to sit in every other seat to maintain social distancing. Regular cleaning and disinfecting of classrooms will be arranged during the designated periods of 12:30 - 13:30 and 17:30 - 18:30.
All students entering the campus are required to complete a travel and health declaration if they have not done so before. A body temperature check will be conducted upon entering the campus and students are required to wear a mask in class at all times.
to be conducted online with the f2f option to be suspended.


The assessment arrangements for all subjects will also remain unchanged. Alternative assessments or take-home examinations will replace on-campus and online invigilated examinations for most subjects. Online invigilated examinations will be adopted for a small number of subjects as announced. On-campus invigilated examinations may be adopted if they are needed to fulfill the professional accreditation requirements, and if so, alternative arrangements will be made available for students currently residing outside Hong Kong.

To facilitate the preparation and updating of classroom information for f2f classes, students’ personalised timetable will be temporarily unavailable between 21 and 27 September 2020. During this period, students can still visit the Subject Timetable (click here). Alternatively, please print/save a copy of your own Semester 1 Class Timetable on or before 20 September 2020. The updated classroom information for f2f classes will be available via eStudent on 28 September 2020.

Grading Arrangement - The Pass/Fail (P/F) grading option is not available for Semester 1 of 2020/21. If students encounter genuine difficulties and hardship, they are required to consult their academic advisors and they may submit a request to the programme offering departments for all of the registered subjects for this semester to be assessed using Pass/Fail grading. For applications which are approved, all subjects taken by the students concerned in this semester will be graded by Pass/Fail. The result will be recorded as “P” (for Pass) or “U” (for Fail) instead of as a Letter grade on your transcript. The results that you receive for subjects in Pass/Fail grade will not contribute to your grade point average (GPA), though you can still earn the applicable credits if you pass the subject.
